casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cedric Theodis HOBBS, Jr. 263PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 20, 2019

John Keating Wiles, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Sterling P. Rozear, Assistant Appellate Defender, Cedric Theodis Hobbs, Jr., for Hobbs, Cedric Theodis (Jr.)

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of May 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of May 2019."

*110Defendant shall have up to and including the 28th day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
